overview:
Manuel Grenacher is cloud business application pioneer and has established coresystems (www.coresystems.ch) and Mila (www.mila.com) a smart business platform for SME. He studied computer science at university of switzerland. Under his leadership, coresystems and Mila maintains its position as the fastest growing cloud application provider for businesses with an annual sales growth rate of 50%.

With a proven track record for his vision and leadership, Manuel’s achievements have been recognized by Gartner, CIO magazine, The Deutsche Telecom innovation awards and the Swiss economic council.
